kernfrasen: leads us all the way from earth to bright glory
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A SEA VOYAGE / FAITH IS A PATH

kernfrasen: our Champion has met the rider of the pale horse
turned to flight the armies of the aliens
found guilty of being a believer
sealed their confession with their blood

cognitieve_implicaties: Life has a specific direction and destination.
Death is not an end but an arrival.
theologische_implicaties: Teleological view of existence; God as the harbor master.
ethische_implicaties: One must stay the course despite storms.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests a passive drifting toward a destination rather than active agency.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The 'voyage of life' is a standard trope, though 'final port' adds a specific sense of closure.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: our Champion has met the rider of the pale horse and has unseated the rider

cognitieve_implicaties: The believer is a spectator to a battle won on their behalf.
theologische_implicaties: Christus Victor theology; death is a defeated personified power.
ethische_implicaties: Confidence and courage in the face of mortality.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Can lead to a triumphalism that ignores the reality of ongoing suffering.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'death' metaphor by using the specific imagery of 'unseating' a rider, creating a vivid mental image.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon moves logically from the 'problem' (the physical decay of the temple/voyage) to the 'solution' (the Champion/Key-holder). It uses the 'Journey' metaphor as a frame for the entire human experience.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The transition from a battlefield where a rider is unseated to a locked door happens abruptly.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: A champion wins through force; a key-holder wins through authorized access.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'brackets' provide a structural container for the 'voyage' path, defining the limits of the journey.

sterktes.beschrijving: The preacher takes the dead metaphor of 'the keys of death' and gives it narrative weight by contrasting it with our own inability to 'unlock the door.'
sterktes.voorbeeld: I cannot unlock the door, but I have a Friend who has keys.

risicos.beschrijving: The description of the family dinner table is so concrete it may lead to a sentimentalized, literal view of heaven as merely a family reunion.
risicos.voorbeeld: Is the ache when my mother goes never to be eased by reunion?
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may focus more on seeing relatives than on the beatific vision of God.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A family dinner table with empty chairs (The World of Loss).
sub_worlds: The Isle of Patmos (The World of Persecution)
The Heavenly Throne Room (The World of Glory)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; it bridges the gap between 'not applying to me' and 'universal application'.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Using Tennysonâ€™s quote to argue that a just God wouldn't give a desire for life without a fulfillment.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Personifying death as a 'king of terrors' and a 'rider' to be fought.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligned with Easter Sunday (Resurrection Sunday) expectations.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon relies heavily on the JOURNEY and MILITARY domains to navigate the tension between the fear of extinction and the hope of resurrection. It successfully moves from the 'Physical/Architectural' decay of the body to the 'Relational' presence of a Friend who holds the keys. The landscape is one of movement from confinement (prison/grave) to liberation.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'washing' to the 'sore and weary' labor of John on Patmos.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The blood that washes is the only water that can cleanse the grime of the Patmos mines.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the 'Kinsman-Redeemer' concept to bridge the military victor with the personal friend.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests that when the building falls, the inhabitant is crushed.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that the 'inhabitant' (spirit) is rescued from the collapsing ruins.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To align with Pauline 'seed' metaphors for resurrection (1 Cor 15).
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The continuity between the 'buried' body and the 'risen' body.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to turn abstract fear into concrete hope through the personification of Christ as the 'Champion' and 'Key-holder'.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: An aesthetic analysis would praise the 'music of each voice' imagery; CMT reveals this as a mapping of SOUND IS LIFE.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Kolb focuses on the 'Experience' cycle; CMT focuses on the 'Cognitive Mapping' that makes the experience possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher uses the 'CONTAINER' schema (in this thing together, in the dust) to create a sense of shared human predicament.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: cut down in the midst of strength
hush the music of each voice
appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses 'Schema Disruption' by starting with the 'Newspaper/Ohio' schema of 'this doesn't apply to me' and forcing the hearer into the 'Universal Human' schema.
